description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史学家、经济学家、自由派公共知识分子。主要研究中国农民史、土地制度变迁史、经济史，曾任清华大学教授，现任香港中文大学教授。
description.en: Chinese historian, economist, and liberal public intellectual. His main research areas include the history of Chinese peasants, the history of land system changes, and economic history. He was a professor at Tsinghua University and is currently a professor at the Chinese University of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 研究苏联和东欧历史的学者，秦晖的妻子。
description.en: A scholar of Soviet and Eastern European history, wife of Qin Hui.

description.zh-cn: 秦晖与金雁的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Qin Hui and Jin Yan.

description.zh-cn: 中国农民战争史与土地制度史学科的开拓者，秦晖的硕士导师。
description.en: A pioneer in the history of Chinese peasant wars and land systems, and Qin Hui's master's thesis advisor.

en: The Chinese University of Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 秦晖于1997年总结的历史现象，指“农民负担简而复繁，出现反弹，反而越改越重”。
description.en: A historical phenomenon summarized by Qin Hui in 1997, which refers to the cycle where the burden on peasants, after being simplified, rebounds and becomes even heavier.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前任国务院总理。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上对农业收成征收的税种，于2006年被废除。
description.en: A tax levied on agricultural production throughout Chinese history, which was abolished in 2006.

en: Walking Out of the Imperial System

description.zh-cn: 秦晖于2015年出版的著作，该书在中国大陆被封杀。
description.en: A book by Qin Hui published in 2015, which was banned in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学社会学博士，对秦晖的“共同的底线”等观点持批评态度。
description.en: A Ph.D. in Sociology from Tsinghua University who is critical of Qin Hui's concepts such as the 'common ground'.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间广西的两大群众组织派别之一。
description.en: One of the two major mass organization factions in Guangxi during the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 哈佛大学费正清研究中心

zh-cn: 哈佛大学费正清研究中心
en: Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies, Harvard University

description.zh-cn: 秦晖提出的政治哲学概念，主张在不同政治立场间寻求权责对应的契约性政府作为共识基础。
description.en: A political philosophy concept proposed by Qin Hui, advocating for seeking a contractual government with corresponding rights and responsibilities as a basis for consensus among different political stances.

description.zh-cn: 秦晖提出的历史政治概念，用以分析中国历史上的专制制度传统。
description.en: A historical-political concept proposed by Qin Hui to analyze the tradition of autocratic systems in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 赵俪生是秦晖在兰州大学就读时的硕士导师。
description.en: Zhao Lisheng was Qin Hui's master's thesis advisor at Lanzhou University.

position.zh-cn: 人文社会科学学院历史系教授、博士生导师
position.en: Professor and Doctoral Advisor, Department of History, School of Humanities and Social Sciences

description.zh-cn: 于1969年至1978年间加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China between 1969 and 1978.

description.zh-cn: 秦晖于1997年将历史上“农民负担简而复繁”的现象总结为“黄宗羲定律”。
description.en: In 1997, Qin Hui summarized the historical phenomenon of 'the peasant's burden simplifying and then becoming complex again' as 'Huang Zongxi's Law'.

description.zh-cn: 该定律于2003年引起时任总理温家宝的注意。
description.en: The law attracted the attention of then-Premier Wen Jiabao in 2003.

description.zh-cn: 作为取消农业税的重要倡导者，其提出的“黄宗羲定律”引起高层关注，间接推动了2006年农业税的废除。
description.en: As an important advocate for the abolition of the agricultural tax, his 'Huang Zongxi's Law' attracted high-level attention, indirectly contributing to the abolition of the tax in 2006.

description.zh-cn: 秦晖是《走出帝制》一书的作者，该书于2015年出版。
description.en: Qin Hui is the author of the book 'Walking Out of the Imperial System', which was published in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 2015年，秦晖的著作《走出帝制》在中国大陆遭到官方封杀并被全面下架。
description.en: In 2015, Qin Hui's book 'Walking Out of the Imperial System' was officially banned and removed from all stores in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 叶攀对秦晖所支持的社会经济制度及其“共同的底线”等观点持批评态度。
description.en: Ye Pan is critical of the socio-economic system supported by Qin Hui and his concepts such as the 'common ground'.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始时，秦晖是初中学生，后成为广西“四二二派”的一员，这段经历深刻影响了他的早年生活。
description.en: When the Cultural Revolution began, Qin Hui was a middle school student and later became a member of the 'April 22 Faction' in Guangxi, an experience that profoundly influenced his early life.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，秦晖是广西四二二派在南宁四中的基层组织“四中革联”的一员。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Qin Hui was a member of 'Sizhong Gelian', the grassroots organization of the April 22 Faction at Nanning No. 4 Middle School.

description.en: Qin Hui is the proponent of the political philosophy concept of the 'Common Ground'.

description.zh-cn: 秦晖是“秦制”这一历史政治概念的提出者。
description.en: Qin Hui is the proponent of the historical-political concept of the 'Qin system'.
